<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 14"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Vengeful Strike](/Feats.aspx?ID=5866) <actions string="Reaction" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Barbarian" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=813" />
<trait label="Rage" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=680" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 83 <sup>1.1</sup>

**Prerequisites**
[Come and Get Me](/Feats.aspx?ID=5845)

**Trigger**
A creature within your reach succeeds at an attack against you.

**Requirements**
You’re under the effect of Come and Get Me.

</column>

---

When struck by an enemy, you respond in turn. Make a melee Strike against the triggering creature. If the triggering attack was a critical success, you can use Vengeful Strike as a free action instead of a reaction.
name: Vengeful Strike
requirement: You’re under the effect of Come and Get Me.
